title: Illum-N-Broom LED-Lighted 4-In-1 Snow Broom and Ice Scraper Refurbished Blue
description: Meet Illum-n-Broom: the bright new tool for safe winter travel. A revolutionary 4-in-1 device, Illum-n-Broom is a snow broom, ice scraper, flashlight, and emergency blinker all in one convenient and compact tool. Now you can safely sweep snow and scrape ice off your car day or night, without damaging its paint, trim, or glass. And Illum-n-Broom's telescoping pole extends from 30 to 49 in. to easily access the snow piled on top of your car's roof or trunk. Two powerful LED lights instantly brighten your task, and the built-in blinker doubles as an emergency flasher when you really need to be noticed. Plus, Illum-n-Broom stows neatly inside your car, so it's always ready when you need it. Just sweep, scrape, and illuminate. Weight: 1.5 lb. Imported. Requires two AAA batteries (batteries not included).
